title: Heaven's Gate
description: Where does your energy go when you die? Does it have a destination? What would happen if it never reached its destination?Simon Gallagher, a brilliant physicist has created a device that can track energy as it leaves the body at the moment of death. His quest to discover its destination leads him to Mullen Falls and a secret that has been protected since the beginning of time. A secret that changes the way he thinks about spirituality and the meaning of life.Dr. Galen Thomas has discovered how to collect energy as it leaves the body at the moment of death. His goal is to use the energy to extend the lives of those he deems worthy. His business partner Devlin Matthews has other ideas. He plans to collect the energy and sell it to anyone with the dream of immortality.The diversion of energy away from its intended destination begins to have grave consequences on the town. Simon must find a way to stop the diversion, protect the woman he loves and keep the ancient secret.Heaven's Gate is a science fiction novel that will take you on an action packed adventure of scientific possibility, clashing values and personal reflection.
author: Deborah Leitch
